Control Name: 5.1.2 Ensure that Activity Log Retention is set 365 days or greater (Scored)
Control Statement: A log profile controls how the activity log is exported and retained. Since the average time to detect a breach is 210 days, the activity log should be retained for 365 days or more in order to have time to respond to any incidents
